comments:
Description:
Class set in AutoText event handler cannot be found.

Build number:2.2.0.v20061206

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert pageNumber in report Master Page.
2. Set a event handler for it and preview

Expected result:
Style color set in class works

actual result:
Class not found.

Error log:
- Class scripting.autotext.AutoTextImpl not found 
Error.ScriptClassNotFoundError ( 2 time(s) )
